summary.para: Adds the objects contained in an to the collection.

param.name: poaSource
param.para: Pointer to the whose contents are to be added to the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Adds a single object to the collection.

param.name: punk
param.para: Pointer to the of the object to be added to the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes all objects from the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes a single, specified object from the collection.

param.name: uiIndex
param.para: A pointer to the index of the object within the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Extends the interface by providing methods that enable clients to add and remove objects that support in a collection.

remarks.para: Use this interface to interact with a collection of generic objects.
